treatment-md.title: Adyte hyalina Bock, Fiege & Barnich, 2010, n. comb.
treatment-md.article-title: Revision of Hermadion Kinberg, 1856, with a redescription of Hermadion magalhaensi Kinberg, 1856, Adyte hyalina (G. O. Sars, 1873) n. comb. and Neopolynoe acanellae (Verrill, 1881) n. comb. (Polychaeta: Polynoidae)
